header.title: Cyclomancy - The Secret of Psychic Power Control

central_thesis: This book presents Cyclomancy, also referred to as White Magic, as a system to awaken and control the 'Autoconscient Primitif' (Self-Conscious Primitive), the source of all hidden psychic powers within each individual. Through specific exercises, practitioners can acquire astonishing mystical abilities for personal gain, self-mastery, and influencing others.

structure_content.chapter_title: What This Book Will Do For You
structure_content.summary: Introduces the book's promise to teach amazing mystical powers like healing, materialization, prophecy, and thought transmission by utilizing inherent 'hidden powers' or 'forgotten powers' (Cyclomancy/White Magic).

structure_content.chapter_title: Primera Lección: How to Make Your Primitive Self-Conscious Car Work
structure_content.summary: Explains that the 'Autoconscient Primitif' is the prehistoric, instinctive spirit. It describes how this innate power, which controls various physiological functions, has been largely dormant in civilized man, but can be awakened for extraordinary achievements.

structure_content.chapter_title: Segunda Lección: How to Put Your Conscious Spirit, the Center for Registering Sensations, and the Center for Organ Control under the Control of Psychic Power
structure_content.summary: Details methods to control one's sensations (pain, temperature, pressure, pleasure) and internal organs (digestion, heart, kidneys) using psychic power. It introduces the concept of the 'Arco Psíquico' (Psychic Arc) as a tool for this control.

structure_content.chapter_title: Tercera Lección: How to Put Your Muscle Coordination Center under the Control of Psychic Power
structure_content.summary: Explains how to use psychic power to achieve incredible muscle coordination, decuple muscular strength, prevent fatigue, and master physical activities with ease, referencing the body's natural muscle interplay during exertion.

structure_content.chapter_title: Cuarta Lección: How to Put Your Nerve Junction Obstacles under the Control of Psychic Power
structure_content.summary: Teaches how to accelerate psychic messages and commands through nerve junctions, thereby enhancing reflexes and mental/physical speed. It introduces the 'Arco Psíquico' as a method to reduce nerve resistance.

structure_content.chapter_title: Quinta Lección: How to Put the Nervous Electricity of Your Brain and Body under the Control of Psychic Power
structure_content.summary: Explores the concept of nervous electricity in the body and how it can be controlled by psychic power. It explains how chemical changes in the body due to conscious commands relate to this electrical activity and aura changes.

structure_content.chapter_title: Sexta Lección: How to Multiply Your Energy Thanks to Psychic Power
structure_content.summary: Describes how to multiply physical and psychic energy through stimulated breathing and maintaining a 'negatively charged' body state, contrasting with 'positive charges' associated with illness or negative emotions.

structure_content.chapter_title: Séptima Lección: How to 'Never Be Tired' by Putting Your Muscular Tonus under the Control of Psychic Power
structure_content.summary: Focuses on maintaining optimal muscular tonus to avoid fatigue, improve physical performance, and enhance psychic power. It details exercises and mental states to achieve this.

structure_content.chapter_title: Octava Lección: How to Use the Stupefying Power of Your Cerebral Horns and Put Them under the Control of Psychic Power
structure_content.summary: Explains the 'Cerebral Horns' as the fifth part of the Autoconscient Primitif, responsible for projecting psychic force. It describes how to use them to emit radiant heat and infra-red sections for various purposes, including healing and attraction.

structure_content.chapter_title: Novena Lección: How to Put Your Visual and Auditory Reflexes under the Control of Psychic Power
structure_content.summary: Teaches how to control and enhance visual and auditory reflexes for improved perception, protection, and performance in sports or daily life, linking them to specific brain centers (colliculi superiores and inferiores).

structure_content.chapter_title: Décima Lección: How to Put Your Primitive Visual Center and Your Great Visual Center under the Control of Psychic Power
structure_content.summary: Details how to awaken and control these visual centers to gain 'four eyes' vision, improving reading speed, color recognition, and overall visual acuity, by influencing the retina's nervous electricity.

structure_content.chapter_title: Oncena Lección: How to Put Your Primitive Auditory Center under the Control of Psychic Power
structure_content.summary: Explains how to develop 'super-acute' hearing, similar to a bat's radar, by controlling the 'Electricidad del Caracol' (Electricity of the Cochlea) and stimulating the primitive auditory centers.

structure_content.chapter_title: Duodécima Lección: How to Use the Self-Conscious Healer to Bring Others under the Control of Psychic Power
structure_content.summary: Describes how to influence others' health and emotions by using the 'Autoconscient Curandero' (Self-Conscious Healer). This involves establishing psychic rapport, projecting infra-red sections, and transmitting 'electron surpluses' through touch and visualized healthy organs.

structure_content.chapter_title: Decimotercera Lección: How to Achieve the Impossible Thanks to Your Body Electricity and Your Cerebral Antennas
structure_content.summary: Introduces the ability to create a 'Lámpara Humana' (Human Lamp) by intensely generating and projecting bodily heat and infra-red emissions through the 'Cerebral Horns', allowing one to illuminate darkness.

structure_content.chapter_title: Decimocuarta Lección: How to Develop Psychic Vision and Reap its Incredible Benefits
structure_content.summary: Explores the development of 'Visión del Poder Psíquico' (Psychic Vision), which includes 'radioscopic eyes' (X-ray vision), 'Astral Microscope' for magnification, and 'Astral Telescope' for distant viewing, by controlling the eye's physical properties through psychic commands.

structure_content.chapter_title: Decimoquinta Lección: How to Develop Psychic Hearing and Reap its Prodigious Advantages
structure_content.summary: Details the development of 'Oído del Poder Psíquico' (Psychic Hearing) to perceive sounds from great distances or otherwise imperceptible frequencies, enhancing hearing by synchronizing the 'Electricidad del Caracol' with sound waves.

structure_content.chapter_title: Decimosexta Lección: How to Use Your Aura for Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Explains the 'aura' as an energy prolongation of the body, composed of gases, radiant heat, infra-red, radio waves, and magnetism. It teaches how to control the aura's composition and project a 'Psychic Harpoon' to influence others or create effects like materialization.

structure_content.chapter_title: Decimoséptima Lección: How to Develop and Use Your Astral Senses for Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Introduces the 'Astral Body' as a duplicate of the physical body capable of leaving it and traveling. It explains how to develop astral senses (sense of presence, psychic sense) for clairvoyance, psychometry, and astral travel, enabling perception on the astral plane.

structure_content.chapter_title: Decimonovena Lección: How to Use the Secrets of Psychic Power Domain to Control Other People at Will
structure_content.summary: Focuses on achieving 'mental dominance' over others by projecting a 'Cono Astral Ensanchado' (Widened Astral Cone) of psychic messages. It teaches how to attract people, improve social influence, and gain business success through controlled psychic projection.

structure_content.chapter_title: Vigésima Lección: How to Put the Physio-Astral World under the Control of Psychic Power and Acquire Miraculous Power
structure_content.summary: Explains the creation of 'Magic Images' (Visión Suscitada) that others perceive as real, and the 'Astral Tube' for remote communication. It also covers techniques like 'Psychic Harpoon' for dissuasion and influencing emotions, 'Astral Microscope' and 'Astral Telescope' for enhanced perception, and 'Levitation' through 'Inverted Magnetization'. The ultimate goal is to awaken the 'Autoconscient Primitif' permanently using the 'Molde Psíquico'.

key_concepts.definition: The utilization of hidden powers within oneself, described as White Magic, enabling the practitioner to achieve healing, materialization, prophecy, and thought transmission.

The instinctive prehistoric spirit, an unknown personality within each individual, serving as the source of all psychic powers and controlling bodily functions. Its awakening and control are central to Cyclomancy.
The fundamental force or energy used to control the Autoconscient Primitif and its various centers, enabling all described psychic feats.
A mental construct or technique to reduce resistance in nerve junctions, stimulate sympathetic nerves, influence emotions, and enhance healing by focusing on pleasant thoughts.

A technique to reverse the flow of nervous electricity, block negative influences, project positive messages, and induce states like happiness or calm. It is achieved by intensely focusing on a contradictory positive thought.

key_concepts.term: Cuernos del Cerebro (Cerebral Horns / Cerebral Antennas)
key_concepts.definition: The fifth important part of the Autoconscient Primitif, located in the optical nerves and retina. It is used for projecting psychic force (photons, infra-red, radio waves) outwards from the body to influence others or create physical effects.
A channel created in the air or ether, formed by powerfully projected psychic commands and photons, used for sending and receiving psychic messages and commands over distances.
A mental construct involving two astral lenses, created from one's aura, to magnify the perception of small physical or astral particles, enabling observation of minute details.
A mental construct involving two astral lenses, created from one's aura, to perceive objects, auras, and thoughts over unlimited distances.

The ability to generate and project an excessive amount of radiant heat and infra-red sections from the body, leading to the emission of visible light, akin to certain bio-luminescent bacteria or electric fish.
The ability to raise one's physical body without support, achieved by psychically inverting the body's magnetic polarity to repel from the Earth.
A technique to voluntarily invert the magnetic polarity of the body, making it repel from Earth's polarity, thereby enabling levitation or attraction/repulsion between individuals.

A method to permanently keep the Autoconscient Primitif awake and under the full control of the conscious and subconscious minds, achieved by putting cerebral waves (Alpha, Beta, Delta, Theta) and Cochlear Electricity under psychic control.

The fundamental principle stating that all matter, living or non-living, consists of molecules in constant motion and interaction. Psychic power can influence this molecular action to achieve 'miracles' by altering temperature, pressure, or other properties of substances.
Esoteric concept of records of all past and future events, inscribed in the ether. The book describes them as 'luminose sections' and 'sound waves' that can be accessed through psychic receptivity.

The faculty of creating mental images with such authenticity that others perceive and accept them as real. This is achieved by projecting conceived images onto another person's retina via psychic power.

An unexplained form of nervous electricity generated in the cochlea, distinct from true auditory nervous electricity. It is presented as a powerful psychic energy source for enhancing auditory perception and influencing other brain centers.

practical_system.description: The practical system, 'Cyclomancy,' is a step-by-step methodology for awakening and controlling the 'Autoconscient Primitif' and its various 'centers' (e.g., psychic power, sensations, organ control, muscle coordination, cerebral horns, visual/auditory reflexes). It emphasizes mental commands, visualization, and the manipulation of 'nervous electricity' and 'photons' to achieve a wide range of psychic and physical effects. The system aims for 'miraculous' results through systematic practice and self-discipline.
tools: Mental commands and strong visualization techniques.

Specific 'centers' within the brain and body (e.g., Psychic Power Center, Sensation Registration Center, Organ Control Center, Muscle Coordination Center, Cerebral Horns, Visual/Auditory Reflex Centers, Primitive Visual Center, Grand Visual Center, Primitive Auditory Center, Psychic Vision, Psychic Hearing).
The 'Arco Psíquico' (Psychic Arc) and 'Antidrome Psíquico' (Antidrome Psychic) as mental constructs for influencing energy flow.
The 'Tubo Astral' (Astral Tube), 'Microscopio Astral', and 'Telescopio Astral' as mental channels and magnification tools.
Focus on electron accumulation and manipulation of 'nervous electricity' and 'photons'.
Basic physical aids for training: bowls of water, mirrors, books, a rubber ball, cotton for ears.
rituals: Directing conscious spirit to 'feel' sensations (e.g., heat/cold in water) against sensory input.
Controlling physiological functions like appetite, digestion, heartbeat, and breathing through mental commands to specific 'centers'.
Developing extreme muscle coordination and strength by influencing the 'Muscle Coordination Center'.
Reducing nerve resistance and accelerating psychic message transmission using the 'Arco Psíquico' (Psychic Arc) and 'Antidrome Psíquico' (Antidrome Psychic) techniques.
Projecting psychic force/radiant heat/infra-red waves through 'Cerebral Horns' for healing, attraction, or creating light ('Human Lamp').
Enhancing visual acuity ('four eyes' vision, X-ray vision) and auditory perception ('super-acute' hearing) by controlling respective sensory centers.
Using the 'Autoconscient Curandero' (Self-Conscious Healer) to influence others' health and emotions through psychic rapport, touch, and visualized healthy organs.
Performing astral projection and using 'Astral Tubes' for remote communication.
Employing 'Astral Microscopes' and 'Astral Telescopes' for magnified and distant clairvoyance.
Achieving physical levitation through 'Inverted Magnetization', reversing body polarity.
Manifesting objects and animals through 'Materialization' using the astral body and visualization.
Accessing 'Akashic Records' (Anales de la Tierra) for knowledge of past and future events.
Creating 'Visión Suscitada' (Excited Vision) to project mental images that others perceive as real.
Establishing 'Atmósfera de Dominio Psíquico' (Atmosphere of Psychic Dominion) to attract desired individuals and circumstances.
Maintaining continuous psychic awakening of the Autoconscient Primitif using the 'Molde Psíquico' (Psychic Mold).

critical_analysis.relevance: This book offers a unique perspective on psychic development, framing esoteric abilities within a pseudo-scientific, bio-electrical model. It blends concepts reminiscent of New Thought (mind over matter, mental healing), traditional occult practices (astral projection, psychometry, clairvoyance, levitation, Akashic records), and a highly original interpretation of neurophysiology (e.g., 'Cerebral Horns,' 'Cochlear Electricity'). While the scientific explanations lack empirical basis, the text's significance lies in its attempt to provide a systematic, 'demystified' framework for acquiring occult powers through dedicated mental and physical exercises. It stands as a mid-20th-century example of how esoteric traditions were re-packaged with a scientific veneer for a new audience. Its detailed operative instructions make it a practical manual for self-initiation into its specific system.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The book is intended for individuals seeking self-mastery, personal empowerment, and the acquisition of psychic abilities for practical benefits in daily life. It appeals to those interested in enhancing health, social influence, business success, and personal relationships. The exercises are framed as accessible to anyone, suggesting a broad appeal to the general public rather than exclusive to experienced occultists.
